item.title: Making "Almost DPI" with Mikrotik firewall rules
item.description: In this article, I create a DPI-like experience by using many firewall rules to redirect traffic.

item.title: Making the Ultimate Hotspot
item.description: Here's how to make the ultimate mobile hotspot from a Mikrotik wAP ac LTE6.

item.title: "Hacking" an LTE Modem
item.description: In this article, I "hack" into a Mikrotik LTE modem and change the IMEI.

item.title: SFP+ Disassembly
item.description: In this article, I take apart an 8P8C SFP+ ethernet module.
